product_name: Power Grips Pedal Straps - Extra Long
long_description: Power Grips straps provide a hands-free, easy-exit way to increase pedal power for all levels of mountain bike, road and recumbent riders. No special shoes are required. Power Grips easily attach to your existing pedals; fits most metal cage pedals that accept standard toe clips and straps. Includes a micro-adjustable bracket which adjusts to fit different shoe sizes; bracket adjusts with a standard 4mm Allen wrench. Strap is impervious to water, mud and freezing temperatures for great all-weather use. Comes with all necessary hardware. Fits men's shoe sizes 12 and larger.
